author: gsfs
body:
Identical changes as pull request #12545 for 8_0_X, here requested for 7_5_X which will be used for 2015 running at 5 TeV
Corrected typo in existing Mixing scenarios to avoid future confusion.
Added new Mixing scenarios for use with 5 TeV pp and PbPb
title: Update mixing scenario names (for 7_5_X)
